title: HPE - Puma Vision
description: Pesquisa e desenvolvimento de técnicas inovadoras para o desenvolvimento de ferramentas que aloquem modelos de forma distribuída e colaborativa, usando aprendizagem de máquina e mantendo os princípios de privacidade da informação.

title: Parlametria - Leggo
description: Intelligence platform for monitoring activities at the National Congress, using data science and machine learning to facilitate advocacy work and interests of RAC.
skills: R - Django - Docker - Shell - Vuejs - PyTrends - D3Js - Vegalite

title: Extrator de discursos - Câmara
description: Tool that retrieves information from speeches of deputies in political session in tabular way, facilitating the work of analyzing this data.

title: Viés de discursos
description: Research project to calculate party alignment and contradiction through the speeches of deputies at the PEC 06/2019

title: Tá na mesa
description: It is a platform aimed at assisting the community and observatories in monitoring the destination of the school lunch in the state of Rio Grande do Sul.
skills: R - SQL - Docker - Python - Nodejs - Angular 9

title: Brasirama
description: It is a game that seeks to sensitize people about the inequalities that exist in our society. He tries to do this by putting the gambler in the place of people who live in the most different realities of our country.

title: Habla
description: This package includes a series of functions that give R users access to Genius data. These data are obtained by scraping their website.

title: Rmetacritc
description: This package includes a series of functions that give R users access to Metacritic's data. These data are obtained by scraping their website.

title: Rgenius
description: This package includes a series of functions that give R users access to Genius data. These data are obtained by scraping their website.

title: Rcongresso
description: R package to access national congress data based on the RESTful API created in 2017, generating data frames and interacting well with tidyverse.

title: Visualização de dados
description: Personal profile that brings together a set of views on music and politics in storytelling format.
